about.whoWeAre: Who we are and what we do?
about.content1: Shafakhaneh is a specialized medical center that was established in 2005 with the aim of providing modern and high-quality medical services. We believe that every individual deserves the best healthcare.
about.content2: By combining advanced technology, specialized doctors, and a human-centered approach, we have created a safe and peaceful environment for treatment and patient recovery.
